dt: {bc}to swing the tail of an airplane from side to side to reduce speed especially when landing
{bc}to have the rear end slide from side to side out of control while moving forward

dt.t: the car {wi}fishtailed{/wi} on the icy curve

shortdef: to swing the tail of an airplane from side to side to reduce speed especially when landing
to have the rear end slide from side to side out of control while moving forward
